content: my very first published design is now re-written and includes a full photo tutorial a beautiful lotus flower sits in the middle of a pool surrounded by shady pavilions a place to dream to contemplate the mysteries of the world to find peace and tranquility or lose yourself in the beauty of nature for a 6 inch square stop at end of round 8 makes a 12 inch square with aran/worsted weight yarn and 5 5mm hook if using a lighter weight yarn the square will be smaller double knit comes out at approx 10 inches with a 4mm hook use this square in any way you like for your own use but please do not reproduce or distribute this pattern without my consent
